public class ZoneServices
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Responsible for all Zone services Services available: - URL (links only) - HTTP (host a website) - FTP (host a file server) - Biz (tba) Transformations to/from XML

Title: TerraPeer

Description: P2P 3D System
